page.title: 10RELIGION CHURCH OF ENGLAND.
page.content: St.Wilfrid's Church is the C.E. parish church for both Kibworth Beauchamp and Kibworth Harcourt.The Rector is The Revd. Fred Dawson who is also Rector of Smeeton Westerby and Saddington.The principal Sunday services are Holy Communion 8 a.m.,Family Communion,9.30 a.m and Evensong at 6.30 p.m.Once a month a family service is held at 11 a.m.These services are spread between all three parish churches.The church communities support a variety of activities.Sunday school is held for the youngest children every Sunday morning.Junior Church and Adventurers for older children meet weekly in the church hall on Friday and Tuesday evenings.Mothers Union and Young Wives Fellowship groups also meet weekly and a choir,flower guild and team of bell ringers are all active.
